rrdworld.name: SnmpGraph
rrdworld.author: Antoine Guilmard
rrdworld.description: SnmpGraph permit to monitor the OIDs of SNMP protocol. You can also monitor all probe of MotherBoardMonitor 5 (temperature, voltage). It automates the update of a RRD data base like does it the famous MRTG but does not use Perl script. The installation can be done as a service in Windows.
